description: The driver in south-western France was set upon by people who reportedly refused to wear face masks.
title: France: Bus driver dies after 'attack over face masks' in Bayonne
title_page: France: Bus driver dies after 'attack over face masks' in Bayonne - BBC News
maintext: Mr Monguillot was set upon after he reportedly asked three of the men to put on face masks and also tried to check another man's ticket.
